mapper.select:
SELECT r.id as id_co, r.ttl, r.expr_dt, r.recruit_no, m.email FROM co c join recruit_anun r ON r.id = c.id join member m on c.id = m.id
WHERE r.id IN (SELECT id_co FROM following WHERE id_mem = #{id})

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(aply_st) AS count_aply_st FROM recruit_anum_st WHERE aply_st ='b1') as count_aply_st , (SELECT COUNT(aply_st) AS count_deny FROM recruit_anum_st WHERE aply_st ='b2') as count_deny , (SELECT COUNT(st) AS count_st FROM recruit_anum_st WHERE st ='1') as count_st FROM dual

select d.recruit_no, d.aply_dt, d.aply_st, d.ttl, d.expr_dt, d.st, e.expr_st, d.ma_buss from (select s.recruit_no, s.aply_dt, get_common(s.aply_st) as aply_st, r.ttl, r.expr_dt, s.st, r.ma_buss from recruit_anum_st s join recruit_anun r on s.recruit_no = r.recruit_no where s.id = #{id}
and s.aply_dt BETWEEN TO_CHAR(sysdate-7,'yyyy-MM-dd') and TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
and s.aply_dt BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-1),'yyyy-MM-dd') and TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
and s.aply_dt BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-2),'yyyy-MM-dd') and TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
and s.aply_dt BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-3),'yyyy-MM-dd') and TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
and sysdate - to_date(r.expr_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') > 0
and sysdate - to_date(r.expr_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= 0
and s.aply_dt BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{startDt},'yyyy-MM-dd') and TO_CHAR(#{endDt},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and s.st = #{st}
and s.aply_st = TO_CHAR(#{aplySt},'yyyy-MM-dd')
) d join (select recruit_no, (trunc(to_date(expr_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd')- sysdate)) as expr_st from recruit_anun) e on d.recruit_no = e.recruit_no
select id, name, pw, ph, ph_cl, email, blog, post, authr, clsf, log_cnt, ltst_tm, gen, birth, addr, join_dt, age, api, nickname from member where id = #{id}
select ttl, resume_no, prtfl_no, shcr_no, carr_no, edu_no, licn_no, ard_no, intro_no, skill_no, img_no from resume where resume_no =(select max(resume_no) from resume where id=#{id}) and id=#{id}
select ard_no, cntn, issu_yy, ard_nm, breu from resume_ard where ard_no = #{ardNo}

select carr_no, wkdty, depart, duty, join_yy, reti_yy, buss, carr_st, co, get_common(wkdty) wkdty_co, get_common(duty) duty_co, get_common(carr_st) carr_st_co from resume_carr where carr_no = #{carrNo}
select edu_no, breu, join_yy, reti_yy, cntn, edu_nm from resume_edu where edu_no = #{eduNo}
select intro_no, cntn, ttl from resume_intro where intro_no = #{introNo}

select shcr_no, breu, mj, join_yy, reti_yy, pnt, shcr_st, tt_score, fg, get_common(fg) as fg_co, get_common(shcr_st) as shcr_st_co, get_common(tt_score) as tt_co from resume_shcr where shcr_no = #{shcrNo}
select skill_no, skill, get_common(skill) as skillNm from resume_skills where skill_no = #{skillNo}
select prov as skill, desct as skillNm from cmmn_dt where comm_cd = 'Z' and prov NOT IN #{arr.skill}
select licn_no, breu, issu_mm, licn_nm from resume_licn where licn_no = #{licnNo}
select PRTFL_NO, PRTFL_FILE, ID, TTL, PRTFL_IMG, NO from resume_prtfl where PRTFL_NO = #{prtflNo}
SELECT 'SKILL'|| TO_CHAR(skill_seq.NEXTVAL) FROM dual
SELECT 'LICN'|| TO_CHAR(Licn_seq.NEXTVAL) FROM dual
SELECT 'ARD'|| TO_CHAR(Ard_seq.NEXTVAL) FROM dual
SELECT 'SCH'|| TO_CHAR(sch_seq.NEXTVAL) FROM dual
SELECT 'CARR'|| TO_CHAR(carr_seq.NEXTVAL) FROM dual
SELECT 'EDU'|| TO_CHAR(edu_seq.NEXTVAL) FROM dual
SELECT 'INTRO'|| TO_CHAR(intro_seq.NEXTVAL) FROM dual
SELECT 'RESUME'|| TO_CHAR(resume_seq.NEXTVAL) FROM dual
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET email = #{email}, ph=#{ph}, ph_cl=#{phCl}, addr=#{addr}, post=#{post} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into resume (resume_no, id, ttl, prtfl_no, img_no, carr_no, edu_no, licn_no, ard_no, intro_no, shcr_no, skill_no, reg_dt) values(#{resumeNo}, #{id}, #{ttl}, #{prtflNo}, #{imgNo}, #{carrNo}, #{eduNo}, #{licnNo}, #{ardNo}, #{introNo}, #{shcrNo}, #{skillNo}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
mapper.select: SELECT ID, RESUME_NO, TTL, CARR_NO, EDU_NO, LICN_NO, ARD_NO, INTRO_NO, PRTFL_NO, SHCR_NO, SKILL_NO, IMG_NO FROM resume WHERE id = #{id} AND resume_no = #{resumeNo}
